# Merging

Merging when there are no conflicts (easiest)

Avoid merge conflicts by waiting a long time before merging a branch to your main code

If you do need to keep a branch for a long time, use merge from main or upmerge to make sure you keep them updated to minimize conflicts when you are ready to merge.
